entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
